text: E! will not be returning to Mariah's World. The Mariah Carey - led docuseries will not be returning for a second season, a spokesperson for the NBCUniversal cable network confirmed Monday. ` ` E!'s Mariah's World was an eight - part event that chronicled her 2016 world tour,'' a spokesperson said in a statement. ` ` It was exciting to bring our viewers inside the private world of today's most iconic stars as she returned to the stage last year.'' The series followed the pop songstress as she launched her Sweet Sweet Fantasy tour in Europe while simultaneously planning her wedding to billionaire James Packer.
